name: Eevee and Eeveelutions Trainer's Corner restyle
description:
Title says it all. :]

Simple restyle for TPPC Trainer's Corner, based on Sci's Green Mudkipz.
Changes the colour of the text and navigation bar.
Also changes the mini-icon on the forums index and changes the banner.

My first style, I hope you like it.
additional_info:
The screenshots are of the index, the user CP and a thread.

You have to use the "HerdULikeEmMudkipz" theme for it to look good.

Credit to Bardon for making the epic banner, and to Sci for telling me how to insert a data URI. :P
